Title: Merck Is Deleveraging Faster Than I Expected After An Excellent First Quarter

Title: Apple, Merck, 'Brexit' Drag Dow Jones Industrial Average Lower
Description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA - 17,675.16) finished the day down 57.9 points, or 0.3%. Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) led the 12 Dow winners, with a gain of 1.3%. Of the 18 Dow losers, MRK came in the lowest, down 2.8%. Week-over-week, the Dow lost 1.1%.

Title: Merck's KEYTRUDA Trial Meets Primary Endpoint In Advanced NSCLC Patients
Description: (RTTNews.com) - Merck & Co Inc. ( MRK) announced Thursday that its KEYTRUDA (pembrolizumab) demonstrated superior progression-free and overall survival compared to chemotherapy as first-line treatment in patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer.
